English DTS make some crackeling sound from time to time

@BehelitOutlaw
The problem is on your side, some programs may kill the cpu in the background. Use MPC and give higher priority in task manager, you probably have lower RAM then 2 GB or your graphic/sound cards can't deal with 1080p + DTS..
I've watched it with DTS and there was no crackling at all.
Next time you find an error give the time(s) where exactly you found your notorious cracklings so the other users can check then agree or disagree with your statement.

I found out it was inthe movie, it's the part when they shoot in training school in the beginning, it sound weardly but it's like that. I posted to quickly i came back to tell it was my error. My hardware rocks, i feel insulted :p jk jk It was a great movie and exellent rip, i thank you again!
